name: python-django
additionalInstructions: For models: list all fields with types (CharField, ForeignKey, etc.) and constraints (max_length, null, blank)
Document model relationships: ForeignKey targets, ManyToManyField intermediates, related_name values
List Meta class options (ordering, verbose_name, indexes, constraints)
Identify model methods: __str__, custom managers, properties
For views: note if Class-Based View or function-based, list permissions/authentication
Document signals if used (pre_save, post_save, etc.) and what they trigger
List admin customizations (ModelAdmin classes, list_display, search_fields)
Note form classes and their validation logic
